nappy rash 
at some time, but some 
have extra-sensitive skin. 
Nappy rashes are caused by 
contact between sensitive 
skin and soiled nappies. If 
you notice redness or spots, 
clean your baby very carefully 
and change their nappies 
more frequently. Better still, 
give your baby time without 
a nappy and let the air get 
to their skin. Keep a spare 
nappy handy to mop up any 
accidents. You will soon see 
the rash start to get better.
If your baby does have a rash, 
ask your midwife or health
